title: Update Contact page with WhatsApp and phone numbers

requirements.text: Update the Contact page to display the user’s provided contact numbers: WhatsApp: 9889144312 and Phone: 9838784245.

quotes:
Add my contact details as 
Wapp 9889144312
And 9838784245

acceptanceCriteria: On /contact, the WhatsApp number 9889144312 is shown as a distinct contact method labeled in English as “WhatsApp”.
On /contact, the phone number 9838784245 is shown as a distinct contact method labeled in English as “Phone”.
Both numbers have a visible “Copy” action that copies the correct number to the clipboard and shows a success toast message in English.
The phone number uses a working tel: link (clicking it opens the device dialer on supported devices/browsers).
The WhatsApp number uses a working WhatsApp deep link (e.g., wa.me or https://api.whatsapp.com) that opens WhatsApp (or WhatsApp Web) on supported devices/browsers.

requirements.text: Remove/replace any placeholder contact phone number currently shown on the Contact page so only the provided numbers are presented as the primary phone/WhatsApp contacts.

quotes:
Add my contact details as 
Wapp 9889144312
And 9838784245

acceptanceCriteria: The previously hardcoded placeholder phone number is no longer displayed as the main contact phone on /contact.
No other placeholder contact numbers are presented as primary contact options on /contact.

constraints: Frontend immutablePaths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Adding or changing backend storage for contact details (contacts can remain static in the frontend).
Adding new authentication or login features.
